comments.body:
This is just a simple bug fix right, not really related to the 1-d iteration issues?

If PyArray_MapIterBind can fail, then shouldn't it return an error code? This is a really obscure way to check for errors.
Yes, you're right, I should figure out what the error conditions are and error code. I've had PyArray_MapIterBind fail when I had oned=1, but I'm still not sure what the error condition was.
